titles.title: President Ronald W. Reagan resolution
A resolution relative to the death of Ronald Wilson Reagan, a former President of the United States.
A resolution relative to the death of Ronald Wilson Reagan, a former President of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 111.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses the condolences of the Senate on the death of the Honorable Ronald Wilson Reagan, a former President of the United States and a former Governor of California.
